text.title: Raise a Child to Respect Religion

head.s: Raise a Child to Respect Religion

text.s: Religion and faith are both important foundations in the upbringing of many children .
Teaching children to respect their own faith , as well as the beliefs of others can help them live in harmony .
This article will show practical ways to do so .

item.s: Stay neutral .
If you place one religion on a pedestal or give it higher importance than another one , your child will have a hard time respecting religion and treating all beliefs as equal .
Keep your explanations neutral and fact-based , and save your personal beliefs for a later discussion , if your child initiates it .

figure.rend: Help an Autistic Child Cope with Change Step 7.jpg

item.s: Try not to belittle any religion or compare one to another .
Let them know that all religions teach people to be good to one another .

figure.rend: Instill Discipline in Children Step 1 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Explain how people adopt their religion .
It is crucial for the parent to know about his/her own religion first and how they adopted it because until we know this , we ca n't pass knowledge on to our children .
Many parents make the mistake of pushing faith on kids without looking at the consequences of prohibiting choice .

figure.rend: Explain Bipolar to a Child Step 2 Version 3.jpg

item.s: Teach kids about faith .
It can help them make a wise and informed choice regarding their own worship .
You can teach kids about :

figure.rend: Appreciate People of Other Religions Step 17.jpg

item.s: The most prominent figure of that religion
The place people of that religion worship
The holy book , and what it means to different people
Traditions and religious customs .
Teach about all religions .
While many people place a focus on the religion they want their child to be or the religion that 's most common where they live , it does n't give your child a well-rounded view of religion .
Talk about all major religions , not just your faith or the most common ones in your area , so they get to learn about all religions and make a decision of their own .
If you do n't know enough about a certain religion to explain it to your child , research it with them .
You could visit the library and pick out books to read together , or look it up online together .
Do n't try to force faith on a child .
Trying to force a child or teen to worship in a certain way creates much distress , so instead provide freedom of choice and experimentation .

figure.rend: Instill Discipline in Children Step 4 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Take your child to many different places of worship , such as a temple , church , gurdwara , cathedral , or mosque so that he/she can actually see them and learn about them .
Introduce him/her to the people who belong to a different religion .
Explain both the positive and negative aspects of all religions .
Purchase or borrow books with teachings from various prophets , and discuss what they mean with kids .
Teach tolerance for each other .
Respect the beliefs of others , no matter how much you agree or disagree with them .
Let your child choose a place of worship when they are of age .
Be proud that you instilled values of faith and respect in them .

figure.rend: Explain Lent to a Child Step 13 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Allow them to ask questions .
Answer their questions for as long as you are comfortable .
When their curiosity becomes too much for your patience or time , guide them towards books , websites , speakers & movies that you trust as credible sources to answer their questions .

figure.rend: Promote Physical Activity in Childcare Step 14.jpg

item.s: Never answer them something misleading in haste .
It may affect their future thoughts .
Encourage them to seek their own answers since religious texts have many interpretations and interpreters .
They can be encouraged to reason and relate religious teachings to their daily life .
Accept their stance .
If they choose to take time or stay without a choice , allow them .
Matters of faith and religion ca n't be forced .
Allow their life incidents and observations to turn their hearts towards a particular religion .

figure.rend: Explain Bipolar to a Child Step 8.jpg

item.s: Let kids ask questions and try your best to provide answers .
Talk about faith openly and let your children know that they are free to talk to you about it .
Never speak harshly about other religions .
It will give your child a negative view of those religions and push them towards religious intolerance .
Various holy books and writings
Access to a library or bookstore
